description.message: Finds the next [>] URL link and lets you plus [+] numbers in a URL

title.description: Extension title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

popup_next_input.description: Next input button title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

popup_prev_input.description: Prev input button title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

popup_clear_input.description: Clear input button title (tool tip) when hovered.

popup_plus_minus_setup_h3.message: Select the part of the URL to [+] or [-]

popup_interval_label.description: Form label for Increment input number.

popup_selection_blank_error.description: Setup error message if the selection is blank.

popup_selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters
popup_selection_notalphanumeric_error.description: Setup error message if the selection is not alphanumeric.

popup_selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be a part of the URL
popup_selection_notinurl_error.description: Setup error message if the selection is not part of the URL.

popup_selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL

popup_interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be 1 or higher
popup_interval_invalid_error.description: Setup error message if the interval is 0 or negative.

options_keyboard_shortcuts_h3.description: The options page's shortcuts keys heading.

options_keyboard_shortcuts_p.message: Keyboard Shortcuts are configured via Chrome. If Quick is enabled, you can Next [>] or Plus [+] instantly without having to enter Setup.

options_default_settings_p.message: You can have URL Next Plus use these values by default when you use Quick Keyboard Shortcuts or inside Setup.

options_default_mode_next_prev_option.message: Use the Next [>] and Prev [<] links on the page

options_default_links_innerHTML_option.message: Prefer links with words like "Next" in them
